醉仙坠子	3	zui xian zhui zi
左顾右眄	3	zuo gu you mian
佐雍得尝	3	zuo yong de chang
作呕瘟疫	3	zuo ou wen yi
作育英才	3	zuo yu ying cai
坐糜廪粟	3	zuo mi lin su
坐骑速度	3	zuo qi su du
三个臭皮匠合成一个诸葛亮	3	san ge chou pi jiang he cheng yi ge zhu ge liang
坐轿的不知扛轿的辛苦	3	zuo jiao de bu zhi kang jiao de xin ku
昨夜灯花报今日喜鹊噪	3	zuo ye deng hua bao jin ri xi que zao
自行由得我官差急如火	3	zi xing you de wo guan chai ji ru huo
砖头瓦块也有翻身之日	3	zhuan tou wa kuai ye you fan shen zhi ri
钟不扣不鸣鼓不打不响	3	zhong bu kou bu ming gu bu da bu xiang
忠臣不怕死怕死不忠臣	3	zhong chen bu pa si pa si bu zhong chen
早霞不出门晚霞行千里	3	zao xia bu chu men wan xia hang qian li
早晨不做官晚上不唱喏	3	zao chen bu zuo guan wan shang bu chang nuo
在人屋檐下怎敢不低头	3	zai ren wu yan xia zen gan bu di tou
在家为父子受事为君臣	3	zai jia wei fu zi shou shi wei jun chen
在家千日好出门一时难	3	zai jia qian ri hao chu men yi shi nan
在家敬父母何必远烧香	3	zai jia jing fu mu he bi yuan shao xiang
云里千条路云外路无数	3	yun li qian tiao lu yun wai lu wu shu
冤家不可结结了无休歇	3	yuan jia bu ke jie jie liao wu xiu xie
与君一席话胜读十年书	3	yu jun yi xi hua sheng du shi nian shu
有状元徒弟没状元师傅	3	you zhuang yuan tu di mei zhuang yuan shi fu
有冤的报冤有仇的报仇	3	you yuan de bao yuan you chou de bao chou
有所不为而后可以有为	3	you suo bu wei er hou ke yi you wei
有什么施主有什么和尚	3	you shen me shi zhu you shen me he shang
有牛别嫌慢有饭别嫌烂	3	you niu bie xian man you fan bie xian lan
有苦时同受有乐时同乐	3	you ku shi tong shou you le shi tong le
有福之人不落无福之地	3	you fu zhi ren bu luo wu fu zhi di
易求无价宝难得有情人	3	yi qiu wu jia bao nan dei you qing ren
医得眼前疮剜却心头肉	3	yi de yan qian chuang wan que xin tou rou
一夜被蛇咬十日怕麻绳	3	yi ye bei she yao shi ri pa ma sheng
一日不识羞三日不忍饿	3	yi ri bu shi xiu san ri bu ren e
一人之心千万人之心也	3	yi ren zhi xin qian wan ren zhi xin ye
一年被蛇咬三年怕井绳	3	yi nian bei she yao san nian pa jing sheng
一年被蛇咬三年怕草索	3	yi nian bei she yao san nian pa cao suo
一家一个主一庙一个神	3	yi jia yi ge zhu yi miao yi ge shen
一个君子待了十个小人	3	yi ge jun zi dai le shi ge xiao ren
一个红脸儿一个白脸儿	3	yi ge hong lian er yi ge bai lian er

一朝被蛇咬三年怕井绳	3	yi zhao bei she yao san nian pa jing sheng
夜饭少一口活到九十九	3	ye fan shao yi kou huo dao jiu shi jiu
要知心腹事尽在不言中	3	yao zhi xin fu shi jin zai bu yan zhong
要知山下事请问过来人	3	yao zhi shan xia shi qing wen guo lai ren

洞中方七日世上已千年	3	dong zhong fang qi ri shi shang yi qian nian
碟大碗小难免磕着碰着	3	die da wan xiao nan mian ke zhe peng zhe
爹死娘嫁人各人顾各人	3	die si niang jia ren ge ren gu ge ren
刀枪药虽好不破手为高	3	dao qiang yao sui hao bu po shou wei gao
但知行好事不必问前程	3	dan zhi hang hao shi bu bi wen qian cheng
大鱼吃小鱼小鱼吃虾米	3	da yu chi xiao yu xiao yu chi xia mi
打柴的不能跟放羊的走	3	da chai de bu neng gen fang yang de zou
从前做过事没兴一齐来	3	cong qian zuo guo shi mei xing yi qi lai
此处不留人会有留人处	3	ci chu bu liu ren hui you liu ren chu
春为花博士酒是色媒人	3	chun wei hua bo shi jiu shi se mei ren
船多不碍港车多不碍路	3	chuan duo bu ai gang che duo bu ai lu

吃着碗里的望着锅里的	3	chi zhe wan li de wang zhe guo li de
吃斋能得道牛马上西天	3	chi zhai neng de dao niu ma shang xi tian
吃人家碗半被人家使唤	3	chi ren jia wan ban bei ren jia shi huan
吃饭想撑死干活怕累死	3	chi fan xiang cheng si gan huo pa lei si
吃饭先喝汤不用请药方	3	chi fan xian he tang bu yong qing yao fang
撑死胆大的饿死胆小的	3	cheng si dan da de e si dan xiao de
炒豆众人吃炸锅一人事	3	chao dou zhong ren chi zha guo yi ren shi
超出三界外不在五行中	3	chao chu san jie wai bu zai wu xing zhong
常在河边站哪有不湿鞋	3	chang zai he bian zhan na you bu shi xie

圣文神武皇帝初	3	sheng wen shen wu huang di chu

我欲醉眠芳草	3	wo yu zui mian fang cao
拔剑撞而破之	3	ba jian zhuang er po zhi
匿怨而友其人	3	ni yuan er you qi ren
颠连直接东溟	3	dian lian zhi jie dong ming
霹雳一声暴动	3	pi li yi sheng bao dong
直指武夷山下	3	zhi zhi wu yi shan xia
月下独酌四首	3	yue xia du zhuo si shou
把汝裁为三截	3	ba ru cai wei san jie
吾令人望其气	3	wu ling ren wang qi qi
何不改乎此度	3	he bu gai hu ci du
今臣亡国贱俘	3	jin chen wang guo jian fu
若白驹之过隙	3	ruo bai ju zhi guo xi
而用之或不盈	3	er yong zhi huo bu ying
而在己为有悔	3	er zai ji wei you hui
称身不必狐裘	3	cheng shen bu bi hu qiu
望残烟草低迷	3	wang can yan cao di mi
是非君子之道	3	shi fei jun zi zhi dao
无所苟而已矣	3	wu suo gou er yi yi
得志与民由之	3	de zhi yu min you zhi
夫子喟然叹曰	3	fu zi kui ran tan yue
出门如见大宾	3	chu men ru jian da bin
故夫知效一官	3	gu fu zhi xiao yi guan
直而无礼则绞	3	zhi er wu li ze jiao
万帐穹庐人醉	3	wan zhang qiong lu ren zui
莫教踏碎琼瑶	3	mo jiao ta sui qiong yao
照野弥弥浅浪	3	zhao ye mi mi qian lang
柳绿更带朝烟	3	liu lv geng dai chao yan
数罟不入闯	3	shu gu bu ru wu chi
我姑酌彼兕觥	3	wo gu zhuo bi si gong
尧舜其犹病诸	3	yao shun qi you bing zhu
夜后邀陪明月	3	ye hou yao pei ming yue
在狱咏蝉并序	3	zai yu yong chan bing xu
可以无大过矣	3	ke yi wu da guo yi
从汀州向长沙	3	cong ting zhou xiang chang sha
路隘林深苔滑	3	lu ai lin shen tai hua
而又不随以怠	3	er you bu sui yi dai
米粟非不多也	3	mi su fei bu duo ye
师与商也孰贤	3	shi yu shang ye shu xian
而后乃今培风	3	er hou nai jin pei feng
言者所以在意	3	yan zhe suo yi zai yi
北京中华书局	3	bei jing zhong hua shu ju
星影摇摇欲坠	3	xing ying yao yao yu zhui
国人皆曰可杀	3	guo ren jie yue ke sha
薄酒可与忘忧	3	bo jiu ke yu wang you
而今我谓昆仑	3	er jin wo wei kun lun
此其志不在小	3	ci qi zhi bu zai xiao
老者衣帛食肉	3	lao zhe yi bo shi rou
言之必可行也	3	yan zhi bi ke xing ye
秦地可尽王也	3	qin di ke jin wang ye
无题二首之一	3	wu ti er shou zhi yi
必也使无讼乎	3	bi ye shi wu song hu
不足以为士矣	3	bu zu yi wei shi yi
转徙於江湖间	3	zhuan xi yu jiang hu jian
然后从而刑之	3	ran hou cong er xing zhi
未有封侯之赏	3	wei you feng hou zhi shang
故能为百谷王	3	gu neng wei bai gu wang
君子矜而不争	3	jun zi jin er bu zheng
千里万里月明	3	qian li wan li yue ming
其愚不可及也	3	qi yu bu ke ji ye
使民如承大祭	3	shi min ru cheng da ji
以致天下之士	3	yi zhi tian xia zhi shi
以能问于不能	3	yi neng wen yu bu neng
愿以境内累矣	3	yuan yi jing nei lei yi

来吾导夫先路	3	lai wu dao fu xian lu
玉颜憔悴三年	3	yu yan qiao cui san nian

难为俗人言也	3	nan wei su ren yan ye
长相思摧心肝	3	zhang xiang si cui xin gan
蹑足行伍之间	3	nie zu hang wu zhi jian

是社稷之臣也	3	shi she ji zhi chen ye

贤者识其大者	3	xian zhe shi qi da zhe
豫兮若冬涉川	3	yu xi ruo dong she chuan
莫恨黄花未吐	3	mo hen huang hua wei tu

我未见好仁者	3	wo wei jian hao ren zhe

今日之事何如	3	jin ri zhi shi he ru
不可以长处乐	3	bu ke yi chang chu le

行天下之大道	3	hang tian xia zhi da dao
范增数目项王	3	fan zeng shu mu xiang wang

迎之不见其首	3	ying zhi bu jian qi shou
言不可不慎也	3	yan bu ke bu shen ye
庄暴见孟子曰	3	zhuang bao jian meng zi yue

吾见其不得已	3	wu jian qi bu de yi
则民莫敢不敬	3	ze min mo gan bu jing

以天下观天下	3	yi tian xia guan tian xia
此亦飞之至也	3	ci yi fei zhi zhi ye
可得而不可见	3	ke dei er bu ke jian
